definitions.definition: An implement , an instrument or apparatus designed (or at least used) as a means to a specific end , especially:

subdefinitions.definition: A non-manual apparatus or device , powered electrically or by another small motor, used in homes to perform domestic functions (household appliance) and/or in offices.
examples: Many house fires are caused by faulty appliances , such as refrigerators, washing machines and dryers.

subdefinitions.definition: An attachment , a piece of equipment to adapt another tool or machine to a specific purpose.

definitions.definition: A means of eliminating or counteracting something undesirable , especially an illness.
Willing service, willingness to act as someone wishes.

main_definition: An implement , an instrument or apparatus designed (or at least used) as a means to a specific end , especially:
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A means of eliminating or counteracting something undesirable , especially an illness.
( obsolete , rare ) Willing service, willingness to act as someone wishes.
